Multiclass Options in the Story

In Baldur's Gate 3, a multiclassing character can choose all his/her class-specific responses. For example, a monk/rogue can choose monk response or rogue response. By Multiclassing, it is easier to test and create the character you dream of without the need of starting a new game and creating a new character.
